name: Neon Rebellion
description:
A game made to the Amaze me game jam, my first game also, done in 3 days, have fun!

Neon Rebellion is a 2d sidescroller were you play as a robot who freed himself from the control of Dr Kron, and now is fighting to destroy him.

Known Bugs (tried to solve them but couldn't at this time)
- Brutes (the guys with a shield) if they touch you, you won't be able to escape until killing them;
- Shooters, when running away they can and probably will go through walls on their backs;

- If a enemy collides with you while you are middle air you will be stuck;

If it gets the interest of many of you I may go back to it, polish the features and develop convertion mechanic. 

All assets were made by me, music and sounds were done using SFXR and MUSAGI (you can find them here on itch)
